title: Surface Laptop 3 Notebook
description: Slim and stylish, available in 13.5” and new 15” touchscreens, rich color options,¹ and two durable finishes. Make a powerful statement and get improved speed, performance, and all-day battery life.²

title: Surface Mobile Mouse
description: Light and portable with smooth scrolling and dongle-free Bluetooth® connectivity, Surface Mobile Mouse works on a variety of surfaces¹ thanks to BlueTrackᵀᴹ technology. Available in a choice of rich colors² to complement your style.

title: Surface Headphones 2
description: Surround yourself with spectacular Omnisonic sound for music, shows, and calls. Stay focused with adjustable noise cancellation. And, listen in comfort all day long with up to 20 hours of battery life.¹
